message: Let us know if you are interested in teaching a class.  We are filling up class time for the spring.
And if you've already contacted us, you will be scheduled soon.
I definitely want to give the iPhone class again - Mick Chagnet, if you are willing to be my lovely assistant, we can do one in early May
Yeah. Let's communicate directly, just in case I miss a Convore topic or eventbrite invitation.
Let me know what date and I'll put it on the eventbrite
